2890:14: none“> evam māya śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān
2890:83: none“> mā na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ sarvapumvapuṣi sthita|
2890:87: none“> teṣām aha hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa samsthitaḥ||
2890:119: none“> mā na jānanti yā nāryaḥ sarvastrīdehasasthitā|
2890:123: none“> tāsām aha hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa sasthitā||
2890:130: none“> atha bhagavān kṛṣṇācalo gāḍhena bhagavatī
2890:144: none“> devi devi mahāramya rahasya cātidurlabha|
2890:148: none“> sārāt sāratara śreṣṭha sarvabuddhaiḥ subhāṣita||
2890:152: none“> śṛṇu vakṣye mahātantram tantrarājeśvara para|
2890:156: none“> nāmnā caikalavīran tu sattvānām āśu siddhaye||
2890:160: none“> aprakāśyam ida tantra adṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya hi|
2890:169: none“> maṇḍale caṇḍaroṣasya praviṣṭo yaḥ samāhitaḥ|
2890:173: none“> śraddhāyatnaparaś caṇḍe tasya tantran tu
2890:178: none“> gurau bhaktaḥ kṛpāluś ca mantrayānaparāyaṇaḥ|
2890:182: none“> bhaktaś caṇḍesvare nitya tasya tantra
2890:187: none“> evam buddhvā tu yaḥ kaścid yogī lobhaviḍabitaḥ|
2890:191: none“> caṇḍasya maṇḍalādṛṣṭe deśayet tantram uttama||
2890:216: none“> naraka nīyate pāpī yadi buddhair api rakṣitaḥ||
2890:220: none“> yadi karmakṣayād duḥkha bhuktvā ca lakṣavatsara|
2890:224: none“> mānuṣya prāpyate janma tatra vajreṇa bhidyate||
2890:228: none“> tasmāc ca maṇḍala cāru vartayen mantravidvratī|
2890:232: none“> praveśya tatra vai śiṣyān pūrvam eva parīkṣitān||
2890:236: none“> tato hi deśayet tantran triṣu lokeṣu durlabha|
2890:240: none“> aśruta deśayed yo'pi so'pi gacchaty adhogati||
2890:244: none“> mukhapāko bhavet tasya yadi buddhasamo'pi hi|
2890:253: none“> bhidyate mūrdhni vajreṇa vṛṣṭikāle na saśayaḥ|
2890:257: none“> tathyam etan mayā devi bhāṣitañ ca varānane||
2890:296: none“> maṇḍalasya kiyan māna vartanīyañ ca kena hi|
2890:300: none“> likhitavyañ ca tathā tatra madhye ki brūhi me
2890:315: none“> maṇḍalasya bhaven mānañ caikahasta dvihastaka|
2890:319: none“> trihastam vā catuḥpañca pañcamānam na cādhika||
2890:323: none“> yasya tasyaiva cūrṇena nānāvarṇakṛtena ca|
2890:331: none“> bhāgena cāṣṭamenaiva dvāra tasya prakalpayet|
2890:347: none“> vajravalīn tu tenaiva aṣṭastambhāś ca kalpayet|
2890:351: none“> dvārāt triguṇita kuryāt dvāratoraṇam uttama||
2890:363: none“> puṭam ekañ ca kartavyañ cakravat parimaṇḍala||
2890:367: none“> tasya pūrvādike viśvapadam aṣṭau samālikhet|
2890:371: none“> navama madhyame tasya madhye khaḍga sunīlaka||
2890:388: none“> pūrve cakrāṅkita khaḍga śvetavarṇa samālikhet||
2890:392: none“> dakṣine pītavarṇan tu yuta ratnena salikhet|
2890:396: none“> paścime raktavarṇan tu raktapadmena cihnita||
2890:400: none“> uttare khaḍgamātran tu śyāmavarṇa samālikhet|
2890:404: none“> cakreṇa cihnitā karttim agnikoṇe sitā likhet||
2890:408: none“> nairṛte pītavarṇā tu likhed ratnasucihnitā|
2890:412: none“> vāyavye ca tathā raktā raktapadmasucihnitā||
2890:425: none“> rajomaṇḍalam ida prokta mayā lokārthasādhane|
2890:429: none“> athavā maṇḍala kuryāt paṭarūpeṇa sulikhita||
2890:433: none“> pūrvavat maṇḍala likhya madhye kṛṣṇacala
2890:438: none“> sapuṭa dveśavajryā vai pūrve śvetācala likhet||
2890:442: none“> tathā pītācala savye pṛṣṭhe raktācala likhet|
2890:446: none“> salikhed uttare śyāmācala vahnau mohavajrī||
2890:450: none“> śvetā nairṛte pītā piśunavajrī samālikhet|
2890:454: none“> vāyavye lohitā devī rāgavajrī samālikhet||
2890:458: none“> aiśāne īrṣyāvajrīm śyāmā likhed vai paṭamaṇḍalam||
2890:480: none“> āgaccha jaḥ hū va hoḥ atra maṇḍale adhiṣṭhāna
2890:501: none“> o kṛṣṇācala puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:505: none“> o śvetācala puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:509: none“> o pītācala puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:513: none“> o raktācala puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:517: none“> o śyāmācala puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:521: none“> o dveṣavajri puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:525: none“> o mohavajri puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:529: none“> o piśunavajri puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:533: none“> o rāgavajri puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ|
2890:537: none“> o īrṣyāvajri puṣpa pratīccha hū phaṭ||
2890:544: none“> puṣpa dīpa tathā dhūpa gandha naivedyam eva ca|
2890:548: none“> pūjāpañcopahāreṇa kuryād vai maṇḍalasya hi||
2890:552: none“> yadā svetācalo madhye mohavajryā samanvitaḥ|
2890:556: none“> tasyaiva maṇḍala jñeyam eva pītācalādike||
2890:581: none“> bhojayen madyamāsaiś ca vandayec ca muhur muhuḥ||
2890:603: none“> katha śiṣyo bhaved bhavyo yojitavyo'tra
2890:608: none“> nirviśaṅkaś ca kartavyaḥ kathaya tva
2890:623: none“> ādau triśaraṇa dadyāt pañcaśikṣāś ca poṣadha|
2890:627: none“> tataḥ pañcābhiśekan tu guhya prajñāñ ca śeṣataḥ||
2890:631: none“> tato bhavyo bhavec chiṣyas tantran tasyaiva
2890:636: none“> durato varjayed anyam anyathā raurava vrajet||
2890:647: none“> buddha gacchāmi śaraṇa yāvad ābhodhimaṇḍataḥ|
2890:672: none“> māraṇañ caurikāñ cāpi parapatnī mṛṣāvacaḥ|
2890:676: none“> tyajāmi sarpavat sarva pañcama madya eva ca||
2890:690: none“> ma sattva ghātayiṣyāmi na hariṣye parasvaka|
2890:698: none“> pramādāyatana madya na pāsyami kadācana|
2890:706: none“> uccaiḥśayyā mahāsayyā vikāle'pi ca bhojana|
2890:710: none“> eva poṣadham aṣṭāṅgam arhatām anuśikṣayā||
2890:714: none“> viśuddha dhārayiṣyāmi yathā buddhena deśita|
2890:718: none“> tena jitvā śaṭhamāra prāpya buddhatvam uttama||
2890:726: none“> sasarāmi bhave yāvat tāvat sugatijaḥ pumān||
2890:730: none“> bhaveya sādhusasargī dhīmān lokahite rataḥ||
2890:746: none“> udakam ākṛṣya sahakārapalavena o āḥ sarva-
2890:773: none“> vartinam iva dhyātvā tacchirasi makuṭa dattvā
2890:791: none“> tasya dakṣiṇahaste dattvā pūrvavad abhiṣiñcayet||
2890:795: none“> o hana 2 māraya 2 sarvaśatrūn jñānakhaḍga hū
2890:805: none“> tasya tarjanīyute vāmahaste dattvā pūrvavad
2890:814: none“> pāśena bandha 2 mahāsatya te dharma te svāhā|
2890:823: none“> roṣaṇamudrayopaveśya tadākāreṇa ca tam ālambya|
2890:827: none“> o he śrībhagavan kṛṣṇācala siddhas tva hū phaṭ||
2890:910: none“> atha guhyābhiṣeko bhavati|| śiṣyo guru
2890:930: none“> mayā kāmasukhārtha te gṛhna nātha kṛpā kuru||
2890:937: none“> tato guru namaskṛtya śiṣyo bahir nirgacchet||
2890:941: none“> o caṇḍamahāroṣaṇa hū phaṭ iti mantra japan
2890:950: none“> pūjayitvā prajñāñ ca satarpya sapuṭībhūya|
2890:958: none“> śiṣyam āhūya tasya jihvāyām anāmikāṅguṣṭhābhyā
2890:1008: none“> atitīkṣṇo hy aya khaḍgaś caṇḍaroṣakare sthitaḥ|
2890:1012: none“> bhedayet samaya yas tu tasya chedanatatparaḥ||
2890:1024: none“> bhaviṣyati tavāpy eva samaya yadi bhetsyasi||
2890:1050: none“> tatas tām eva prajñā śiṣyasya samarpayet||
2890:1057: none“> iyan te dhāraṇī ramyā sevyā buddhaiḥ prakāśitā|
2890:1061: none“> atikrāmati yo mūḍhaḥ siddhis tasya na cottamā||
2890:1068: none“> tato guruḥ karṇe kathayet caturānandavibhāga||
2890:1081: none“> tato bahir nirgacched guruḥ|| prajñā tu
2890:1092: none“> ki tvam utsahase vatsa madīyāśucibhakṣaṇa|
2890:1096: none“> viṇmūtrañ caiva raktañ ca bhagasyāntaḥ pracūṣaṇa||
2890:1104: none“> kiñ cāha notsahe mātas tvadīyāśucibhakṣana|
2890:1108: none“> kāryā bhaktir mayā strīṇā yāvad ābodhimaṇḍataḥ||
2890:1116: none“> aho madīya ya padma sarvasukhasamanvita|
2890:1120: none“> sevayed yo vidhānena tasyāha siddhidāyinī||
2890:1124: none“> kuru padme yathākāryam dhairya dhairyaprayogataḥ|
2890:1128: none“> svayañ caṇḍamahāroṣaḥ sthito hy atra mahāsukha||
2890:1139: none“> dhyātvā prajñāñ ca dveṣavajrīrūpeṇa sapuṭa
2890:1185: none“> japtavya kīdṛśa mantra vada tva parameśvara||
2890:1203: none“> āsana kalpayet tatra yathālabdha samāhitaḥ||
2890:1207: none“> prathama bhāvayen maitrī dvitīye karuṇām
2890:1212: none“> tṛtīye bhāvayen muditām upekṣā sarvaśeṣataḥ||
2890:1216: none“> tato hṛdi bhāvayed bīja padmacandraraviṣṭhita|
2890:1220: none“> raśmibhiḥ purato dhyāyān niṣpanna caṇḍaroṣaṇa||
2890:1224: none“> pūjayen manasā tañ ca puṣpadhūpādibhir budhaḥ||
2890:1228: none“> tadagre deśayet pāpa sarvapuṇya pramodayet||
2890:1232: none“> triśaraṇa gamana kuryād yācanādhyeṣaṇām api|
2890:1236: none“> ātmānañ ca tato dattvā puṇyañ ca pariṇāmayet||
2890:1240: none“> praṇidhāna tataḥ kṛtvā bodhau cittan tu
2890:1245: none“> namaskāra tataḥ kuryāt raśmibhiḥ saharet punaḥ||
2890:1249: none“> paṭhitvā mantram etad dhi śūnyatādhyānam
2890:1261: none“> cintayed raśmibhir dagdha sa hūkāra prayatnataḥ|
2890:1265: none“> karpūradāhavad dhyātvā raśmiñ cāpi na
2890:1279: none“> sarvam ākāśasakāśa kṣaṇamātra vibhāvya ca|
2890:1288: none“> agrato bhāvayet paścāt ya ra va la catuṣṭaya|
2890:1296: none“> bhrukārañ ca tato dhyātvā kūṭāgāra prakalpayet|
2890:1304: none“> dhyāyet tanmadhyake padma viśva aṣṭadalānvita|
2890:1312: none“> ravi rakārajātañ ca tadūrdhva hūkṛti punaḥ|
2890:1316: none“> tajjam akṣobhyaka dhyāyen māmakyā saha sapuṭa||
2890:1320: none“> sakramet tatra yogīndras tasya mūrdhabilena ca|
2890:1328: none“> tataḥ śukrarasībhūtaḥ pateh tasyā bhagodare|
2890:1332: none“> niṣpannañ caṇḍarūpan tu niḥsarec ca bhagāt tataḥ||
2890:1336: none“> hanyāt khaḍgena cākṣobhya pitara paścāt prabhakṣayet|
2890:1340: none“> māmakyāpi tatas tañ ca bhakṣita vai
2890:1345: none“> tato hi māmakī gṛhya mātara saprakāmayet|
2890:1357: none“> tarjanyā tarjayantañ ca daṣṭroṣṭha tu nipīdita||
2890:1374: none“> vāme bhūmiṣṭhajānuñ ca kekarākṣa bhayānaka||
2890:1378: none“> vasudhā tarjayantañ ca vāmajānvagrataḥ sthita|
2890:1398: none“> tato manthānayogena pūrve śvetācala sṛjet||
2890:1406: none“> pītācala sṛjet savye piśunavajrīñ ca nairṛte||
2890:1410: none“> raktācala sṛjet pṛṣthe raktāñ ca rāgavajrikā|
2890:1414: none“> vāyavye cottare śyāmācala śyāmām īśānake||
2890:1418: none“> īrṣyāvajrī sṛjet paścāt sa prajñotgatim āvahet|
2890:1429: none“> pahu maitrī tu vivarjia hohi mā śunnasahāva|
2890:1433: none“> tojju viyoe phiṭumi sarve sarve hi tāva ca||
2890:1441: none“> mā karuṇācia iṭṭahi pahu mā hohi tu śunna|
2890:1445: none“> mā mojju deha sudukkhia hoi hai jīva vihuna||
2890:1462: none“> kī santu harisa vihohia śunnahi karasi paveśa|
2890:1466: none“> tojju nimantaṇa karia manua cchai lohāśeṣa||
2890:1474: none“> yovanavuṇttim upekhia niṣphala śunnae ditti|
2890:1478: none“> śūnasahāva vigoia karahi tu mea sama ghiṭṭi||
2890:1486: none“> svapneneva ida śrutvā dravāj jhatiti utthitaḥ|
2890:1490: none“> pūrvakeṇaiva rūpena dhyāyāt ta sapuṭātmaka||
2890:1494: none“> tataḥ śvetācala hatvā mohavajrī prakāmayet|
2890:1498: none“> rūpa śvetācala kṛtvā punaḥ pītācala haret||
2890:1502: none“> kāmayet piśunavajrīn tu kṛtvā pītācalātmaka|
2890:1506: none“> hatvā raktācala tadvat kāmayed rāgavajrikā||
2890:1510: none“> kṛtvā raktācalātmaka hanyāc chyāmācala punaḥ|
2890:1514: none“> īrṣyāvajrī tataḥ kāmyā kṛtvā śyāmācalātmaka||
2890:1522: none“> sapuṭa caikam ātmāna bhāvayen nirbhara yatī|
2890:1526: none“> ahakāra tataḥ kuryāt siddho'ha naiva saśayaḥ||
2890:1530: none“> kṛṣṇavarṇo hi yo yogī sa kṛṣṇācalabhāvakaḥ|
2890:1534: none“> śvetagauro hi yo yogī sa śvetācalabhāvakaḥ|
2890:1538: none“> pītavarṇo hi yo yogī sa pītācalabhāvakaḥ|
2890:1551: none“> raktagauro hi yo yogī sa raktācalabhāvakaḥ|
2890:1555: none“> śyāmavarṇo hi yo yogī sa śyāmācalabhāvakaḥ||
2890:1559: none“> kṛṣṇavarṇā tu yā nārī dveṣavajrī vibhāvayet|
2890:1563: none“> śvetagaurā tu yā nārī mohavajrī vibhāvayet||
2890:1567: none“> pītavarṇā tu yā nārī piśunavajrī vibhāvayet|
2890:1571: none“> raktagaurā tu yā nārī rāgavajrī vibhāvayet||
2890:1575: none“> śyāmavarṇā tu yā nārī īrṣyāvajrī vibhāvayet|
2890:1579: none“> vajrayogī naraḥ sarvo nārī tu vajrayoginī||
2890:1591: none“> kṛṣṇo hi māraṇe dveṣe śvetaḥ śāntau matāv api|
2890:1595: none“> pītaḥ stambhane puṣṭau vaśyākṛṣṭe tu lohitaḥ||
2890:1599: none“> śyāma uccāṭane khyāto yad vā jatiprabhedataḥ|
2890:1603: none“> kṛṣṇo ḍombaḥ śito vipraḥ pītaś cāṇḍālako mataḥ||
2890:1607: none“> raktas tu naṭakaḥ śyāmaḥ smṛto rajaka ity api|
2890:1615: none“> śitakanyā śitātmā tu pītakanyā supītakaḥ|
2890:1619: none“> rakto hi raktakanyān tu śyāmakanyān tu śyāmakaḥ||
2890:1623: none“> yā tām athavā gṛhya yattadbhāvanāparaḥ|
2890:1627: none“> kāmayet sthiracittena yathā ko'pi na budhyate||
2890:1644: none“> āsā śukra bhaved vajra jihvayā sarvam ālihet||
2890:1648: none“> yāvadiccha pibet mūtra tāsām arpya bhage mukha|
2890:1652: none“> gudapadme cārpya vai viṣṭhā yāvadiccha prabhakṣayet||
2890:1661: none“> nijāhāram ida śreṣṭha sarvabuddhaiḥ prabhakṣita||
2890:1683: none“> atha bhagavān sarvamāraparājaya nāma samādhi
2890:1718: none“> o hrā hrī hrau caṇḍarūpe caṭa 2 pracaṭa
2890:1768: none“> 2 moṭṭa 2 saṭṭa 2 tuṭṭa 2 tiṣṭha 2 āviśa 2 āḥ
2890:1772: none“> mahāmattabālaka dhūṇa 2 tiṇa 2 khāda 2 vighnān
2890:1776: none“> māraya 2 duṣṭān bhakṣa 2 sarva kuru 2 kiri 2
2890:1789: none“> trāṭ mahābala sāṭaya samānāya trā mā hā
2890:1799: none“> jvālaya trāṭ asaha namaḥ svāhā||
2890:1866: none“> o picu 2 prajñāvardhani jvala 2 medhāvardhani
2890:1906: none“> ima bali gṛhna 2 mama sarvavighnān hana 2
2890:1910: none“> caturmārān nivāraya 2 trāsa 2 bhrāma 2 cinda 2
2890:1914: none“> bhinda 2 nāśa 2 tāpa 2 śoṣa 2 cheda 2 bheda 2
2890:1947: none“> gāḍham āliṅgya padmena vajragharṣaṇa kṛtvā
2890:1977: none“> bhāvayed ekacittena mama rūpam aharniśa||
2890:1981: none“> kalpayet svastriyan tāvat tava rūpeṇa nirbharā|
2890:1989: none“> mātara duhitara cāpi bhaginī bhāgineyikā|
2890:1993: none“> anyāñ ca jñātinī sarvā ḍombinī brāhmaṇī tathā|
2890:1997: none“> caṇḍālī natākīñ caiva rajakī rūpajīvikā|
2890:2001: none“> vratinī yoginīñ caiva tathā kāpālinī punaḥ||
2890:2005: none“> anyāñ ceti yathāprāptā strīrūpeṇa susasthitā|
2890:2009: none“> sevayet suvidhānena yathā bhedo na jāyate||
2890:2013: none“> bhede tu kupitaś caṇḍaroṣaṇo hanti sādhaka|
2890:2017: none“> avīcau pātayet tañ ca khaḍgapāśena bhīṣayet||
2890:2021: none“> neha loke bhavet siddhiḥ paraloke tathaiva ca|
2890:2025: none“> tasmāc ca guptam atyanta kartavya nāpi gocara||
2890:2042: none“> abhyantakāminām arthe mayā buddhena bhāṣita||
2890:2054: none“> buddho'ha cācalaḥ siddhaḥ prajñāpāramitā priyā|
2890:2058: none“> bhāvayet svasvarūpeṇa gāḍhena cetasā sudhīḥ||
2890:2070: none“> striya pratyakṣataḥ kṛtvā samukhe copaveśya hi|
2890:2074: none“> dvābhyām anyonyarāgeṇa gāḍham anyonyam īkṣayet||
2890:2078: none“> tato dṛṣṭisukha dhyāyan tiṣṭhed ekāgramānasaḥ|
2890:2082: none“> tayā tatraiva vaktavya sukhottejaḥkara vacaḥ||
2890:2086: none“> tva me putro'si bhartāsi tva me bhrātā pitā
2890:2091: none“> tavāha jananī bhāryā bhaginī bhāgineyikā||
2890:2095: none“> saptabhiḥ puruṣair dāsas tva me kheṭasaceṭakaḥ|
2890:2099: none“> tva me kapardakakrītas tavāha svāminī matā||
2890:2103: none“> patec caraṇayos tasyā nirbhara sampuṭāñjaliḥ||
2890:2107: none“> vadet tatredṛśa vākya sukhottejaḥkara para|
2890:2111: none“> tva me mātāpitur bhāryā tva me ca bhāgineyikā||
2890:2115: none“> bhaginīputrabhāryā ca tva svasā tva ca māmikā|
2890:2132: none“> paśya mā kṛpayā mātaḥ snehadṛṣṭinirīkṣaṇaiḥ|
2890:2136: none“> tataḥ sā puruṣa śliṣṭā cumbayitvā muhur muhuḥ||
2890:2140: none“> dadāti tryakṣara maste vaktre vaktrarasa madhu|
2890:2144: none“> padma coṣāpayet tasya darśayen netravibhrama||
2890:2148: none“> vaktre ca carcita dattvā kucena pīḍayed hṛda|
2890:2152: none“> samukha tanmukha dṛṣtvā nakha dattvā
2890:2157: none“> vadet tasyedṛśam vākya bhakṣa vairocana mama|
2890:2161: none“> pibākṣobhyajala putra sapitrā dāsako bhava||
2890:2165: none“> tava gosvāminī cāha mātā rājakūlīty api|
2890:2169: none“> madīya caraṇa gaccha śaraṇam vatsa nirantara||
2890:2173: none“> mayā samvardhito yasmāt tvam ānarghyam upāgata|
2890:2177: none“> kṛtajño bhava bho vatsa dehi me vajraja sukha||
2890:2181: none“> tridala paṅkajam paśya madhye kiñjalkabhūṣita|
2890:2197: none“> skandhe pādayuga dattvā mamādhordhva nirīkṣaya|
2890:2206: none“> dehi dhāpasahasra tva lakṣyakoṭi athārbuda|
2890:2223: none“> svavajra tatra prakṣipya sukhaiś citta
2890:2228: none“> vāyu vāyu supadma me sārāt sāram anuttara||
2890:2236: none“> bruvantīm iti tā dhyāya stabdhībhūyaikacetasā||
2890:2240: none“> bhāvayet tajjaka saukhya niścalo gāḍhacittataḥ|
2890:2244: none“> tasami pratyuttara dadyād vilamba tva priye kṣaṇa||
2890:2248: none“> yāvat strīdehaga rūpa kṣaṇamātra vicintaye|
2890:2255: none“> strī ekā jananī khalu trijagatā
2890:2290: none“> kin tu vācyo guṇaḥ strīṇā sarvasattvaparigrahaḥ|
2890:2294: none“> kṛpā vā yadi vā rakṣā strīṇā citte pratiṣṭhitā||
2890:2323: none“> āstān tu darśana tasyāḥ spṛṣṭighṛṣṭiñ ca dūrataḥ|
2890:2327: none“> yasyāḥ smaraṇamātreṇa tatkṣaṇa labhyate sukha||
2890:2331: none“> pañcaiva viṣayāḥ strīṇā divyarūpeṇa sasthitāḥ|
2890:2335: none“> tām udvāhitā kṛtvā sukha bhuñjanti mānavāḥ||
2890:2343: none“> puṇye puṇye mahāpuṇye prasāda kuru me'mbike||
2890:2347: none“> tatas tā gāḍhato dṛṣṭvā svauṣṭha dantena pīḍayet|
2890:2351: none“> kurvan śītkāraka yogī tāñ ca kuryād vinagnikā||
2890:2355: none“> kuryāt sukhodayabandha bandhañ ca dolacālana|
2890:2359: none“> bandha jānugrahañ caiva bandha cāpy ūrumardana||
2890:2363: none“> pādacālanabandhañ ca bandhañ ca bhūmicāpita|
2890:2367: none“> bandha samadantakañ caiva bandhañ ca citrasajñaka||
2890:2375: none“> tathaiva kūrmabandhañ ca sarvatobhadram eva
2890:2380: none“> tatra paryaṅkamadhye tu striyañ cotkuṭakāsanā|
2890:2384: none“> kṛtvā bāhuyugam skandhe svasya gāḍhena
2890:2389: none“> svasya bāhuyuga tasyāḥ kakṣamadhyād vinirgata|
2890:2393: none“> padme prakṣipya vajran tu khyāto
2890:2402: none“> īṣac ca cālayed dvābhyā khyāto'ya dolacālanaḥ||
2890:2415: none“> tasyā jānudvaya svasya hṛdi kṛtvā tu sapuṭa|
2890:2423: none“> tasyāḥ pādatalau svasya corumūle niyojayet|
2890:2431: none“> tasyāḥ pādatalau nābhau hṛdi pārśvadvaye'pi hi|
2890:2439: none“> tasyāḥ pūladvaya bhūmau sasthāpya kroḍakoṭare|
2890:2447: none“> tā utkuṭakena sasthāpya dvipādañ ca prasārayet|
2890:2451: none“> bandhaḥ samadantako jñeyaḥ pratyeka cāpi
2890:2456: none“> tasyāḥ pādayuga vakra kṛtvā vāme prayojayet|
2890:2460: none“> savye'pi samukhe cāpi hṛdā pṛṣṭham spṛśet tataḥ||
2890:2468: none“> punaḥ sukhodaya kṛtvā tām uttānena pātayet||
2890:2472: none“> savyena ca kareṇaiva vajra padme niveśayet|
2890:2476: none“> tasyā jānutale gṛhya kaphaṇy ūrdhva niyojayet||
2890:2480: none“> anyonyaveṇīhaste ca bhramarījālam iti smṛta|
2890:2484: none“> tasyāḥ pādayuga dattvā svaskandhopari nirbhara||
2890:2488: none“> yantrārūḍho hy aya bandho veśāveśaprayogataḥ|
2890:2492: none“> tasyā vāma pada skandhe savya vāmorumūlataḥ||
2890:2505: none“> tasyāḥ savya pada skandhe vāma savyorumūlataḥ|
2890:2509: none“> urdhvapādo hy aya bandhaḥ satsukho duḥkhanāśanaḥ||
2890:2513: none“> tasyāḥ pādatale vakṣomadhye same niyojayet|
2890:2517: none“> bāhūbhyā pīḍayej jānū kūrmabandha udāhṛtaḥ||
2890:2521: none“> tasyāḥ pādatale netre karṇe mūrdhni niyojayet|
2890:2529: none“> citraparyantaka yāvat kuryāt sarva vicitraka|
2890:2537: none“> cumbayec ca mukha tasyā yāvadiccha punaḥ punaḥ|
2890:2541: none“> unnāmya vadana dṛṣṭvā yatheccha vākyaka vadan||
2890:2545: none“> jihvāñ ca cūṣayet tasyāḥ pibel lālā mukhodbhavā|
2890:2562: none“> dantakakṣāñ ca tajjāta mala sarvañ ca bhakṣayet|
2890:2566: none“> masta netra gala karṇam pārśvam kakṣa kara
2890:2571: none“> cumbayitvā nakha dadyāt tyaktvā netradvaya
2890:2576: none“> mardayet pāṇinā cuñca cūṣayed daśayet tataḥ||
2890:2580: none“> svayam uttānikā kṛtvā cumbayet sundarodara|
2890:2584: none“> atraivāha sthitaḥ pūrva smṛtvā smṛtvā muhur
2890:2598: none“> hastena sparśayet padma vāyu sundaram iti
2890:2603: none“> dadyāc cubanakha tatra paśyen niṣkṛṣya pāṇinā||
2890:2607: none“> ghrātvā gandhañ ca tad randhra śodhayed
2890:2616: none“> praviṣṭo'ha yathānena niḥsṛtaś cāpy anekaśaḥ||
2890:2620: none“> vadet tatredṛśa vākya panthāya nāsikarjuḥ|
2890:2624: none“> aya eva ṣaḍgateḥ panthā bhaved ajñānayogataḥ||
2890:2632: none“> tataḥ padmagata śveta rakta vā sukhasātkṛtaiḥ||
2890:2636: none“> bhakṣayec ca mukha tasyāḥ sapaśyaś ca punaḥ
2890:2641: none“> sa nakha coruka kṛtvā mardayed dāsavat padau||
2890:2645: none“> mastake tryakṣaram dadyād dhṛnmadhye laghumuṣṭika|
2890:2649: none“> tataś citrāt parān bandhān kuryād yogī samāhitaḥ||
2890:2653: none“> icchayā dhyāyaka tatra dadyāt saukhyaikamānasaḥ|
2890:2657: none“> yatheccha prakṣaren no vā kṣaret saukhyaikamānasaḥ||
2890:2665: none“> bhakṣayet padmaga śukra śoṇita cāpi jihvayā||
2890:2673: none“> prakṣālya jihvayā padma prajñām utthāpya
2890:2678: none“> kroḍīkṛtya tataḥ paścād bhakṣayen matsyamāsaka|
2890:2691: none“> pibed dugdhañ ca madyam vā punaḥ kāmapravṛddhaye||
2890:2695: none“> śrame jīryati tatpaścād icchayet tu sukhādibhiḥ|
2890:2708: none“> caṇḍaroṣapada dhatte janmany atraiva yogavit||
2890:2712: none“> rāgiṇā siddhidānārtha mayā yogaḥ prakāśitaḥ|
2890:2716: none“> vāmajaṅghopari sthāpya savyajaṅghā tu līlayā||
2890:2724: none“> savyajaṅghopari sthāpya vāmajaṅghā tu līlayā||
2890:2737: none“> līlayā savyajaṅghān tu vajraparyaṅkakaḥ smṛtaḥ|
2890:2741: none“> bhūmau pādatale sthāpya same samukhadīrghake||
2890:2749: none“> bhūmau pādatale sthāpya vakre tiryak
2890:2758: none“> tiryak jānuyuga bhūmau gulphamadhye tu pūlaka||
2890:2766: none“> sattva padma tathā vajra paryaṅkam iti kalpita||
2890:2770: none“> utkūṭaka cārdhacandrañ ca dhanvāsanam ida mata|
2890:2787: none“> patitvā salihet padma gṛhnan sulakṣatryakṣara|
2890:2791: none“> punar dhanvāsana kṛtvā svānana tadgudāntare||
2890:2795: none“> pātayitvā guda tasyāḥ salihen nāsayāpi ca|
2890:2803: none“> tate mukto bhavet yogī sarvasakalpavarjitaḥ|
2890:2807: none“> virāgarahita citta kṛtvā mātrā prakāmayet||
2890:2811: none“> anurāgāt prāpyate puṇya virāgād agham āpyate|
2890:2815: none“> na virāgāt para pāpa na puṇya sukhataḥ para||
2890:2819: none“> tataś ca kāmaje saukhye citta kuryāt samāhitaḥ||
2890:2834: none“> bho bhagavan ki nṛṇām eva kevalam aya
2890:2850: none“> atrānuraktā ye tu sattvāḥ sarvadikṣu vyasthitāḥ|
2890:2854: none“> devāsurā narā nāgās te'pi siddhyanti sādhakāḥ||
2890:2914: none“> nānāmūrtidharāḥ sarve bhūtā māyāvino jināḥ||
2890:2918: none“> yathā paṅkodbhava padma paṅkadoṣair na lipyate|
2890:2922: none“> tathā rāganayodbhūtā lipyante na ca doṣakaiḥ||
2890:2947: none“> maithuna kurvato jantor mahān syāt pariśramaḥ|
2890:2951: none“> tasya viśramaṇa nātha jantvarthe vaktum
2890:2974: none“> bhuñjīta masyamāsan tu piben madya samāhitaḥ||
2890:2982: none“> strīṇā prathamato dadyāt taducchiṣṭan tu bhakṣayet||
2890:2986: none“> tasyā ucchiṣṭayantre tu bhoktavyañ ca nirantara|
2890:2990: none“> tasyāś cācamana nīra padmaprakṣālana pibet||
2890:2994: none“> gudaprakṣālana gṛhya mukhādi kṣālayed vratī|
2890:2998: none“> vāntan tu bhakṣayet tasyā bhakṣayec ca catuḥsama||
2890:3002: none“> pibec ca yonija vāri bhakṣayet kheṭapiṇḍaka|
2890:3006: none“> yathā sakāra āsādya vṛkṣo bhoti phalādhikaḥ||
2890:3014: none“> na jarā nāpi rogaś ca na mṛtyus tasya dehinaḥ||
2890:3018: none“> sevayed aśuci yo'sau niryogo'pi sa sidhyati|
2890:3022: none“> bhakṣa vā yadi vābhakṣa sarvathaiva na
2890:3027: none“> kāryākārya tathā gamyam agamyam caiva yogavit|
2890:3031: none“> na puṇya na ca vā pāpa svarga mokṣa na
2890:3036: none“> sahajānandaikamūrtis tu tiṣṭhed yogī samāhitaḥ|
2890:3040: none“> eva yogayukto yogī yadi syād bhāvanāparaḥ||
2890:3048: none“> yadi brahmaśata hanyād api pāpair na lipyate||
2890:3061: none“> tasmād evavidha nātha bhāvayec caṇḍaroṣaṇa|
2890:3065: none“> yenaiva naraka yānti jantavo raudrakarmaṇā||
2890:3069: none“> sopāyena tu tenaiva mokṣa yānti na saśayaḥ|
2890:3073: none“> manaḥpūrvagama sarva pāpapuṇyam ida mata||
2890:3081: none“> viṣa nāmantrita yadvad bhakṣaṇād āyuṣaḥ kṣayaḥ||
2890:3085: none“> tad eva mantrita kṛtvā sukham āyuś ca vardhate|
2890:3092: none“> atha tasmin kṣaṇe devī prajñāpāramitā varā||
2890:3100: none“> vajracaṇḍī mahākruddhā vaded īdṛśam uttama||
2890:3107: none“> madīya rūpaka dhyātvā kṛtvāhakāram uttama|
2890:3111: none“> yadi brahamaśata hanyāt sāpi pāpair na
2890:3120: none“> mārayen matsyapakṣīñ ca yoginī na ca lipyate||
2890:3128: none“> striyaḥ sarvā hi prāyeṇa tāsām arthe prakāśita||
2890:3160: none“> tvadīya yoginā rūpa jñātavya tu katha priye|
2890:3164: none“> bhagavatī cārādhitā kena yoginā vā bhaviṣyati||
2890:3178: none“> yāvad dhi dṛśyate loke strīrūpa bhuvanatraye|
2890:3182: none“> tan madīya mata rūpa nīcānīcakula gata||
2890:3186: none“> devī cāsurī caiva yakṣiṇī rākṣasī tathā|
2890:3190: none“> nāginī bhūtinīkanyā kinnarī mānuṣī tathā||
2890:3197: none“> gandharvī nārakī caiva tiryakkanyātha pretikā|
2890:3206: none“> kāyastrī rājaputrī ca śiṣṭinī karauttinī|
2890:3210: none“> vaṇijinī vāriṇī veśyā ca tariṇī carmakāriṇī||
2890:3214: none“> kulatriṇī hatriṇī ḍombī cāṇḍālī śavariṇī tathā|
2890:3226: none“> kaivartī khaṭakī kuṇḍakāriṇī cāpi mālinī||
2890:3230: none“> kāpālinī śakhinī caiva varuḍinī ca kemālinī|
2890:3234: none“> gopālī kāṇḍakārī ca kocinī ca śilākuṭī||
2890:3251: none“> mātā ca bhaginī bhāryā māmikā bhāgineyikā||
2890:3255: none“> khuṭṭikā ca svasā caiva anyā ca sarvajātinī|
2890:3259: none“> vratinī yoginī caiva raṇḍā cāpi tapasvinī||
2890:3267: none“> sthitā vai sarvasattvārtha svasvarūpeṇa niścitāḥ||
2890:3279: none“> sevitās tu striyaḥ siddhi sarvasattvahitaiṣiṇā|
2890:3283: none“> dadanti kṣaṇamātreṇa tasmāt sasevayet striya||
2890:3287: none“> striyaḥ svargaḥ striyo dharmaḥ striya eva para
2890:3292: none“> striyo buddhaḥ striyaḥ saghaḥ prajñāpāramitā
2890:3301: none“> nīlavarṇā tu yā nārī dveṣavajrīti kīrtitā||
2890:3305: none“> śvetagaurā tu yā nārī mohavajrī hi sā matā|
2890:3309: none“> pītavarṇā tu yā nārī sā devī piśunavajrikā||
2890:3313: none“> raktagaurā tu yā nārī rāgavajrī prakīrtitā|
2890:3317: none“> śyāmavarṇā tu yā nārī īrṣyāvajrīti kathyate||
2890:3321: none“> ekaiva bhagavatī prajñā pañcarūpeṇa sasthitā|
2890:3342: none“> darśanaiḥ sparśanaiś cāpi smaraṇais tadvacaḥkaraiḥ||
2890:3350: none“> śaktau kāyena kartavyam aśaktau vākyacetasā||
2890:3354: none“> tenāha pūjitā tuṣṭā sarvasiddhi dadāmi ca|
2890:3358: none“> sarvastrīdeharūpan tu tyaktvā nānyā bhavāmy aha||
2890:3362: none“> tyaktvā strīpūjana nānyan madīya syāt prapūjana|
2890:3370: none“> sarvatra sarvadā nitya tasya dṛṣṭipatha gatā|
2890:3374: none“> madīyāśeṣarūpeṇa dhyātvā svastrīñ ca kāmayet||
2890:3386: none“> caurīm api yadā kuryād yadi vā prāṇimāraṇa|
2890:3390: none“> vaded vātha mṛṣāvākya bhañjayet pratimādika|
2890:3394: none“> sāghika bhakṣayed vātha staupika paradravyaka|
2890:3398: none“> na pāpair lipyate yogī mamārādhanatatparaḥ||
2890:3402: none“> nakhena cūrṇayed yūkā vastrasthām api mārayet|
2890:3406: none“> anenaiva prayogeṇa mā samārādhayed vratī||
2890:3410: none“> na kuryāc ca bhaya pāpe nārakādau ca durgatau|
2890:3414: none“> bhaya kuryāt tu lokasya [ tā ] vac chaktir na labhyate||
2890:3418: none“> na pāpa vidyate kiñcid na puṇya kiñcid asti hi|
2890:3435: none“> cittamātra yataḥ sarva kṣaṇamātrañ ca tatsthitiḥ|
2890:3439: none“> naraka gacchate ko'sau svarga prayāti hi||
2890:3447: none“> viṣābhāve'pi sayati tathā svargam adhogati|
2890:3451: none“> eva bhūtaparijñānād nirvaṇa cāpyate budhaiḥ|
2890:3455: none“> nirvāṇa śūnyarūpan tu pradīpasyeva vātataḥ||
2890:3459: none“> tacchede ca pacet so'pi na bodhipadam aśnute|
2890:3463: none“> tasmāt sarva parityajya mām evārādhayed vratī||
2890:3467: none“> dadāmi kṣaṇamātreṇa caṇḍasiddhi na saśayaḥ||
2890:3484: none“> kimākāro bhavec caṇḍas tasya siddhis tu kīdṛsī|
2890:3503: none“> caṇḍāś ca sarva evaite yoginyā tu mayoditāḥ|
2890:3507: none“> nīlavarṇas tu yo bhartā sa ca nīlācalaḥ smṛtaḥ||
2890:3511: none“> śvetagauro hi yo bhartā sa śvetācalasajñakaḥ|
2890:3515: none“> pītavarṇo hi yo bhartā sa khyātaḥ pītakācalaḥ||
2890:3528: none“> raktagauro hi yo bhartā sa raktācala udāhṛtaḥ|
2890:3532: none“> śyāmavarṇo hi yo bhartā sa khyātaḥ śyāmakācalaḥ||
2890:3536: none“> eka eva bhavec caṇḍaḥ pañcarūpena sasthitaḥ|
2890:3540: none“> eṣa caṇḍaḥ samākhyāto'sya siddhir dṛḍhatvataḥ||
